text: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ

translation.en: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory
translation.id: Diizinkan (berperang) bagi orang-orang yang diperangi, karena sesungguhnya mereka dizalimi. Dan sungguh, Allah Mahakuasa menolong mereka
